Keywords: Green Lantern Corps , Herald , Justice League , Soldier
Real Name: John Stewart
Special Powers
IN BRIGHTEST DAY...: Willpower. When John Stewart uses it and succeeds, he takes a maximum of 2 damage from attacks until your next turn.
THE ARCHITECT: Barrier, Invulnerability. Barrier as FREE, but only to generate 2 markers.
